name: Deribit
introduce: Deribit is currently the largest cryptocurrency options exchange. Its Bitcoin options trading volume accounts for more than 80% of the total market trading volume, and the Ethereum options trading volume accounts for more than 90% of the total market trading volume. Like most cryptocurrency exchanges, Deribit trades 24x7. While Deribit accounts for the vast majority of bitcoin options market trading volume, it is an unregulated exchange.
